signupDescription: Create your account to get started
agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
resetLinkSent: Password reset link has been sent to your email
resetError: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
weakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this page

demo.title: Try Demo Account
demo.fullAccess: Full access to all features with pre-loaded contacts, conversations, and analytics
demo.rolesHint: Each role has different permissions - try them all to see the full platform

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.setupDescription: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
mfa.enrollDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
mfa.step1Description: Download and install an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy on your phone.
mfa.step2Description: Open your authenticator app and scan the QR code below, or enter the setup key manually.
mfa.step3Description: Enter the 6-digit code shown in your authenticator app to complete setup.
mfa.successDescription: Your account is now protected with 2FA. You'll need to enter a code from your authenticator app when signing in.
mfa.enterCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.needAuthenticatorApp: An authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, etc.)
mfa.needSecurePlace: A secure place to store backup codes
mfa.scanQRCodeDescription: Open your authenticator app and scan this QR code to add your ADSapp account.
mfa.backupCodesWarning: These codes can be used if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
mfa.confirmSavedCodes: Please confirm that you have saved your backup codes securely
mfa.verifySetupDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup.
mfa.codeChanges30Sec: The code changes every 30 seconds. Enter the current code from your app.
mfa.enterBackupCode: Enter one of your backup codes
mfa.enterAuthenticatorCode: Enter the code from your authenticator app
mfa.backupCodeUsedOnce: Each backup code can only be used once
mfa.troubleSyncTime: Make sure your device time is synchronized
mfa.troubleEnterCurrent: Try entering the current code from your authenticator app
mfa.troubleLostApp: If you've lost access to your app, use a backup code
mfa.troubleContactSupport: Contact support if you've lost both your app and backup codes
